Title: The reddest reddest red sun in our heart, Chairman Mao and us together
Designer: Zhejiangsheng gongnongbing meishu chuangzuozu (浙江省工农兵美术创作组)
Publisher: Zhejiang renmin meishu chubanshe (浙江人民美术出版社)
Notes: Mao and Lin Biao on Tiananmen Gate, surrounded by ecstatic Red Guards. Mao 'received' the Red Guards on Tiananmen Square ten times from August to November 1966, always accompanied by Lin Biao. At each rally, a million people or more were present, shouting, singing and waving their Little Red Books for hours.The designer group calls itself the 'Zhejiang Province worker-peasant-soldier art creation group'.
